title: Project
body: I don't really know where to put skin feedback so im putting it here, Project Fiora's riposte animation looks a little more like arcade than project, i just thought i'd throw my 2 cents in

replies.body:
I think her ultimate SFX = Arcade. It sounds like the level-up sounds that you get, or when picking up coins or speed boosting.
It should be more like Yasuo's W SFX, like a piece of techno-infused paper being ripped to shreds.
ahh yeah i see that too, good catch
meh who cares riot will do what they want, how about you stop procrastinating and do something useful
any one else have thoughts about the skins

This and the fio skins were the 2 i wanted most but im a little disappointed in them both, Leos ult doesnt sound powerful enough while all the other sounds are fairly loud, id support the idea of slightly softening the sounds of the auto attacks and zenith blade and increasing the impact sound of the ult
